Instance Methods

changeTo(toState : IState) : Void -> Void

inline disable() : Void

Disabling the FSM means that the current state can't change until it's enabled again. Before the FSM is disabled, the currentState is changed to the default-state.

dispose() : Void

inline enable() : Void

Method checks of the given state exists in this FSM instance. FIXME: check if looking up if a state is a property of an FSM is more efficient with reflection
